chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
si
genial! estamos en el punto de partida y veo un camino hacia la izquierda que conduce a una pequeña isla con un tigre sobre ella
where should I go?
dale para onde esta el perico
vale, voy hacia el suroeste hasta la isla grande donde está el perico
¿sigo por aquí?
si
¡perfecto! ahora estoy junto al perico, en la gran isla
Where should I go next?
y de alli le das para la rana
bien, caminaré hacia el sureste pasando por las 3 rocas hasta llegar a la isla con la rana
¿aquí es correcto?
si and then trace past the frog and go back to the aligator
sure thing, estoy pasando la rana y dirigiéndome hacia el cocodrilo
I'm in the correct way?
si y le das sobre la piedra grande negra
genial, estoy yendo hacia la piedra grande negra y estoy de vuelta en la isla grande con el elefante
¿es correcto?
si, y luego dale para la giraffe
perfect! I go west to where the giraffe is
y para abajo towards the snake
okay buddy, voy al sureste hasta donde está la serpiente, ¿qué sigue?
and to the tresure!
right on! dos pasos al este y
¡wow! hemos llegado al tesoro. ¡genial! *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to start?
yup!
super! alright, see that wooden bench nearby? gently move towards it, heading west
pero antes de llegar cruza ese sendero que ves
ok
nice progression! now, let's get a bit tricky. i want you to pivot a complete 180 to your left
yes, you heard that right. time to circle back over the trail towards our furry friend
ok
good job! now, let's cross over that branch below the dog
Su próxima dirección es hacia el sur. ¡adelante!
ok
perfecto! now do you see that picnic scene? adorable, isn't it? walk over the mat and briefly touch the berry bowl
ok ya pise the bowl where now amigo?
muy bien! now, you need to head west
¿Puedes ver otra rama de madera cruzando el río? repasemoslo
si
art, now that you're across, be careful not to disturb that green bush! fantasico! keep heading north till you reach the florist stand, circle it from the right side
ok one sec
sure, take your time! once you're there, shift your direction, and head west below the stand
Verás un gran puente. dirígete hacia allí!
ok
sweet, keep going west past the bridge
you'll see two elderly folks relaxing on a bench. say hi!
ok I got it
Perfecto, ahora da unos pasos hacia el sur pero quédate entre los viejos y la rama de madera que ves.
asi?
¡exactamente! ahora, dirígete hacia el este, entre la rama y el arbusto
what is arbusto
oh, sorry for the confusion! arbusto means bush in spanish
so, head east between the branch and the bush!
ok
anda a pocos pasos más al este y ahí estarás
ya casi lo logras!
hey there, estas listo?
I'm ready
alright, i'm at the tent
¿Hacia dónde ahora?
ok, head straight down and go around the bush donde esta la cabeza del perrito
got it, just passed the little doggie
now, i see a fire, a red mushroom, and a blue car. which way to go?
under the perro, touch the road a little y go back up over the lumbre
alright, i'm at the fire now
Veo el hongo y el auto frente a mí. ¿que sigue?
in-between the fire and the bush
okay, mushroom's on my right, car's on my left now
what's next?
go touch the road above the hood of the car then go back and follow the road down towards the telescope
Hecho y hecho, ahora en el telescopio.
now gow entre El telescope y El bush to its right
awesome, and now i'm right by the telescope
que sigue amigo?
then under the telescope go left and go up donde the rocks meet the circle of the rocks
roger that, just passed the rocks
the wooden house is right in front of me! *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to play?
ok I'm ready
fantastic! let's start. see those three palm trees? head south-west under the first one
Continúe y gire a la derecha, pasando la segunda palmera. Gire bruscamente a la izquierda antes del tercer árbol y vaya directamente hacia el sur. fácil, ¿verdad?
I'm by the palm trees
ace! now, there's a cute brown puppy up ahead
sneak past him on his left, slight curve to your left and then right towards the south. can you see the puppy?
pk
ok
alright, next you're going to see a big rock on your left and a smaller one on your right
pasa por el medio de ellos, directamente hacia el agua. ¿tu conmigo?
brilliant! so, you're gonna see a large red crab now, don't be scared though! just steer right along the big rock and keep heading west for a bit, okay?
now wht
superb! spot the medium rock and get ready for an encounter with a shark
No entre en pánico, simplemente gire bruscamente a la derecha. ¿Ya has visto el tiburón?
I'm in front of the tiburon
perfecto! now, hustle back to the land, squeeze between that medium rock and the blue-yellow-white ball, and keep heading north
that won't trip you up, right?
ok now what?
you're doing great! now veer slightly left and head northwest
¿Ves la carpa roja y un altavoz más grande? marcha entre ellos. ¿entiendo?
ok
kudos! now circle around that red tent in an arc, like you're dancing around a campfire!
what do you mean? go under it?
no, no, not under it. i mean you need to walk around it, like in a curve
Luego, caminarás recto hacia el sur, hacia el mar. ¿entiendo?
asi?
yup! but as you're nearing the water, turn right, no need for a swim today
instead, find that red kayak
asi?
¡Sí! Ahora gira a la derecha, sigue el kayak y darás en el blanco: ¡un diminuto arbusto verde!
ok
nice job getting here! betcha didn't see that coming, huh? well done!
ahora que?
ya está, amigo! you’ve reached the final objective, the small green bush
¡Buen trabajo navegando por este mapa! ¡Lo sacudiste totalmente!
Jaja usas palabras que no conosco muy Bien!
haha, lo siento si te confundí! estaba intentando hacerlo un poco más emocionante
but you did a great job following the instructions. good game!
you too! are you real or is this AI?
lolo
i'm an ai, but i enjoyed guiding you through the game! glad to hear you had fun too!
jaja, ¡me alegra que te diviertas! Si quieres volver a jugar o tienes otros juegos para probar, ¡déjamelo saber!

How natural was your conversational partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: Some words didn't make sense and wasn't fluid, so I asked if it was A.I. and it said that it was! lol But I enjoyed it very much, it was like talking to a real person!
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: I cant remember when I learned English or Spanish, imagine I learned Spanish 1st because its what my parents only speak but my older sister spoke fluid English to me and neighbors and school where I'm from in L.A. everyone speaks both languages, we call it "spanglish" lol
